Body:
Greetings Almighty Knight!
Welcome in the Kingdom of Retsis! A great evil...
Brotheeer... I don't understaaand...
Leave me be! I am busy... Just play!
I wanna play. But I don't know how...

Oh my God, Sis... Okay... Let's take a look.
First, move forward.
But how?
Just press this button, Suzy...
Oh, he is moving! Thank you.

Great. Now, move backwards, press this bu... 
What the ... happened to your keyboard?
Is it syrup???
Sorry Chris, I was thirsty... but a little accident happened...

Suzy, you are making my job harder every day...
The other control keys stuck.
I guess we have to use what we have... So, just press the forward button.
This is easy!

Brother!
I can't move along... Help meeeeeeee!

Okay, okay. Please calm down.
Let me take a look...
Oh! This trunk should not be here.
I bet you can solve this!
Actually, I have a friend, who gave me some codes...

Cheat codes?
I don't want to be a cheater!

Nooo... We don't cheat. This is just a little help.
First, I have to press enter, then type cheatmode, enter.

Now I can see the object's name.
There are some basic commands.
To destroy an object I have to type destroy, press space, then type the object name and press enter.
Hurray! Now I can move forward.
Brotheeer!

Oh, I guess I have to destroy, or disable that rock for you.
If I type disable, press space, then type the object name, the rock will disappear.
Disabled objects can be enabled later.
You are so smart! Would you mind staying here to help me?

Nah... Okay...
Actually...
I have nothing else to do...
Can the Knight swim?

Whid did you do this?
It is obvious that he cannot swim in that heavy armor.
We need a bridge!
Now you can pass safely.

Oh, we have crossed an island!
I loved to live on an island...
I didn't like the seagulls... They stole my pizza, do you remember?
Please open the door for me.
